biography: Lauri is a talented golfer who hails from Pickala Golf Club.  He has consistently demonstrated his skill and dedication to the game through his participation in the prestigious Hector Trophée.

This will be Lauri's fourth appearance at the Hector Trophée, having previously competed in the 2023, 2024, and 2025 editions. While he hasn’t yet claimed victory in either the main competition or as the individual Victor, his continued participation speaks volumes about his commitment and competitive spirit.  He’s undoubtedly one to watch as he strives to improve upon his past performances.

Lauri's experience at the Hector Trophée has given him invaluable insight into the challenges of this unique tournament. With each appearance, he's honed his skills and gained a deeper understanding of the course, which promises to make him a strong competitor this year.
